mapper.select: SELECT t.thr_name thr_name, t.thr_loc thr_loc FROM ( SELECT thr_name FROM ( SELECT house_no FROM screen WHERE movie_cd = #{movie_cd} AND TO_char(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} AND startdate > sysdate GROUP BY house_no ) s, house h WHERE h.house_no = s.house_no GROUP BY thr_name ) h1, theater t WHERE h1.thr_name = t.thr_name AND gb_del = 'N'
SELECT thr_loc, thr_name FROM theater WHERE gb_del = 'N'
SELECT count(*) buySeat FROM reservation r WHERE screen_cd = #{screen_cd} AND gb_cancel = 'N'

SELECT m.*, h.*, mt.*, s.screen_cd screen_cd, startdate, gb_jojo FROM screen s, movie m, house h, movie_type mt WHERE s.movie_cd = m.movie_cd AND s.house_no = h.house_no AND s.movie_type_cd = mt.movie_type_cd AND screen_cd = #{screen_cd}
SELECT res_seat FROM reservation WHERE screen_cd = #{screen_cd} AND gb_cancel = 'N'
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE enddate > sysdate

SELECT s.screen_cd screen_cd, house_name, startdate, movie_type_des, movie_name, movie_length, thr_name, house_name, movie_mainpic_path, s.movie_cd FROM screen s, movie m, house h, movie_type mt WHERE s.movie_cd = m.movie_cd AND s.house_no = h.house_no AND s.movie_type_cd = mt.movie_type_cd AND s.screen_cd = #{screen_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (res_no, merchant_uid, mem_cd, screen_cd, mem_cat, res_seat, resdate, pricesum, gb_cancel, discount, mem_coupon_no, use_point) values( #{res_no} || LPAD(res_seq.nextval,4,0), #{merchant_uid}, #{mem_cd}, #{screen_cd}, #{mem_cat}, #{res_seat}, sysdate, #{pricesum}, 'N', #{discount}, #{mem_coupon_no}, #{use_point})

INSERT INTO reservation (res_no, merchant_uid, mem_cd, screen_cd, mem_cat, res_seat, resdate, pricesum, gb_cancel, discount, mem_coupon_no, use_point) values( #{res_no} || LPAD(pay_seq.nextval,4,0) || LPAD(res_seq.nextval,4,0), 'M' || #{merchant_uid} || LPAD(pay_seq.nextval,4,0), #{mem_cd}, #{screen_cd}, #{mem_cat}, #{res_seat}, sysdate, #{pricesum}, 'N', #{discount}, #{mem_coupon_no}, #{use_point})

SELECT 'M' || #{merchant_uid} || LPAD(pay_seq.currval,4,0) merchant_uid FROM dual
